node_name.D: 研究生项目录取可能性

Data.text_description:
The probability of amount of time spent studying for an exam being long (A=1) is 0.6290. 
For those with amount of time spent studying for an exam being short (A=0), the probability of grade received on the exam being high (B=1) is 0.4108. 
For those with amount of time spent studying for an exam being long (A=1), the probability of grade received on the exam being high (B=1) is 0.5421. 
For those with amount of time spent studying for an exam being short (A=0) and grade received on the exam being low (B=0), the probability of overall gpa being high (C=1) is 0.4605. 
For those with amount of time spent studying for an exam being short (A=0) and grade received on the exam being high (B=1), the probability of overall gpa being high (C=1) is 0.4841. 
For those with amount of time spent studying for an exam being long (A=1) and grade received on the exam being low (B=0), the probability of overall gpa being high (C=1) is 0.7108. 
For those with amount of time spent studying for an exam being long (A=1) and grade received on the exam being high (B=1), the probability of overall gpa being high (C=1) is 0.7299. 
For those with amount of time spent studying for an exam being short (A=0), the probability of likelihood of getting accepted into a graduate program being high (D=1) is 0.6503. 
For those with amount of time spent studying for an exam being long (A=1), the probability of likelihood of getting accepted into a graduate program being high (D=1) is 0.8055.
